rdf:Description.dc:title: Commercial greenhouse production in Alberta 2002
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Calpas, James.
Alberta. Alberta Agriculture, Food, and Rural Development.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Agriculture, Food and Rural Development, Information Packaging Centre,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The author wishes to give special recognition to Pat Cote and Scott Graham, the other members of the Greenhouse Crops Team at the Crop Diversification Centre South in Brooks, whose technical expertise in greenhouse sweet pepper production in Alberta forms the basis for specific cultural recommendations."

"This manual was submitted in fulfillment of the course requirements for AFNS 602 (Graduate Reading Project) as part of the requirements of the Ph.D. program at the University of Alberta supervised by Dr. J.P. Tewari."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Greenhouse management
Greenhouses
